categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Hakkun Re Hanuther was a Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. By 3643 BBY, Re Hanuther was serving as the resident advisor in the Tetan Royal Palace when the Jedi was infected with a plague by the Sith Lord Vivicar. However, Re Hanuther was freed when Vivicar was defeated.

Hakkun Re Hanuther was first mentioned in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, in a message to Jedi Consular players after end of Act I if they chose to allow Terrak Morrhage to kill the Jedi Masters connected to him.
